review: It works great if you have a wifi router bit I use my phone as a hot spot since I live in a rural comunity without other Internet access and it doesn't work.  Your phone must connect to the device through wifi, so I need to use my wife's phone to create a hot spot then mine to control the chrome cast device.  Otherwise it works well.  If there was a dedicated remote like roku units have it would fix this issue.  My situation is out of the norm and that's why I still give it 3 stars

review: I wanted another smart tv without having to buy another set.  Chromecast is the perfect solution.  It works beautifully.  I look forward to the day more options become available.  Knowing the power of Google the wait should not be that long.  Another plus is that the device is portable and can be used on any TV in the house with a HDMI port.Chromecast is easy to set up and easy to use.  So much so that I didn't have to "consult" with my 20 something sons for help.  Keep on innovating Google and thanks.
